caption.p: Influence of X-slide carriage straightness error and spindle roll error on the surface topography: ( a) 2D surface topography when considering the influence of X-slide straightness error; ( b) sectional view of surface topography corresponding to ( a); ( c) 2D surface topography when considering the influence of spindle roll error; ( d) sectional view of surface topography corresponding to ( c). Reproduced with permission from [ 94].
